LanguageData.MoodOffsetOptimist.label: 樂觀

LanguageData.MoodOffsetPessimist.label: 悲觀

LanguageData.MoodOffsetDepressive.label: 憂鬱
LanguageData.MoodOffsetDepressive.description: 因為"憂鬱"特性而降低的心情。
